title: Quartz Countertops, Wood-Style Plank Flooring, Recycling
posting_body: Ask us about our move-in specials!
Enjoy our cozy collection of luxury apartments in Oakland, happily tucked in our little pocket of Temescal.
We’re dedicated to bringing you a thoughtful and welcoming sanctuary wrapped in the vibrant surrounds of Temescal.
We may be small in numbers (43 total residences), but we’re big in what we bring to the table with our unique floor plan options.
That’s our promise, and we want you to hold us to it.
Contact us today and schedule a tour to learn more about our wonderful community!
-Short Distance to BART and AC Transit
-Fire Pit
-Oversize Rain Shower Heads
-Easy Access to Public Parking and Hiking Trails
-Quartz Countertops
-Off
Street Parking
-Great Natural Light with Large Floor to Ceiling Windows
-Garage Parking Available
-Freeway Access Nearby
-Spacious Closets
-Open Floor Plans
-Rooftop Deck with Dining Area and Lounge
